title: Errors in Listing of Author's Institutional Affiliations in the articles by Polachek et al (Arthritis Care Res, January 2017 (pages 67–74), (Reply) Arthritis Care Res, March 2017 (page 457), Arthritis Care Res, July 2017 (pages 997–1003), and Arthritis Care Res, November 2017 (pages 1685–1691)
